mapper.select: SELECT q.hq_goods_code, q.hq_goods_name, p.actual_stock, o.logis_goods_stock FROM logis_stock_taking p, logis_wh o, hq_goods q WHERE o.hq_goods_code = p.hq_goods_code AND q.hq_goods_code = o.hq_goods_code and o.hq_goods_code = #{hq_goods_code} and o.wh_code = #{wh_code} and o.logis_code = #{logis_code}
